author: @cartacapital
title: Varejo e serviços mostram alta em julho, mas cenário indica desaceleração à frente
text:
Os indicadores do Índice de Geração de Emprego e Tendência (IGet) de julho mostram avanço na atividade do varejo e leve recuperação nos serviços prestados às famílias. Após três meses seguidos de retração, o IGet do varejo ampliado subiu 1,4% na comparação com junho, refletindo melhora no consumo em segmentos como móveis, eletrodomésticos e automóveis.
O varejo restrito também registrou alta de 1,1% no mês e crescimento acumulado de 13,4% na comparação anual. Os dados positivos sinalizam recuperação gradual da atividade comercial, com destaque para supermercados (+0,9%) e outros artigos de uso pessoal (+2,0%).
Consumo reage apesar da política monetária Mesmo com os efeitos da política monetária restritiva em curso , a demanda segue sustentada por fatores como o mercado de trabalho aquecido e novas linhas de crédito. A liberação de empréstimos consignados para trabalhadores da iniciativa privada e o pagamento de precatórios foram apontados como estímulos adicionais à economia.
Segundo análise do Santander, esses impulsos ajudam a compensar os impactos dos juros altos sobre o consumo. No entanto, a expectativa é de perda de fôlego à frente, com desaceleração mais clara ao longo do segundo semestre.
Serviços às famílias têm leve recuperação No setor de serviços, o IGet registrou alta de 0,2% em julho, revertendo parte da forte queda observada em junho. O resultado interrompe uma sequência de dez meses consecutivos de queda na comparação anual, que agora aponta retração de 8,3%.
A alta foi puxada principalmente pelo segmento de “outros serviços às famílias”, com crescimento de 6,0%, e por alojamento e alimentação, que subiram 0,5%. Apesar da reação, o índice ainda não retornou aos níveis observados em maio.
Combustíveis e vestuário seguem em queda Entre os segmentos do varejo ampliado, apenas combustíveis (-0,5%) e vestuário (-6,4%) apresentaram queda em julho. Por outro lado, materiais de construção avançaram 0,3% e o setor automotivo teve alta de 1,8%, contribuindo para o desempenho geral do índice.
O comportamento dos setores de bens duráveis, que costumam ser mais sensíveis aos juros, será determinante para o ritmo da atividade nos próximos meses. A expectativa é de crescimento moderado com variações pontuais, influenciado por crédito, renda e confiança do consumidor.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: Martha Díaz
title: Nintendo Switch 2 saldrá a la venta con un paquete que incluye el Mario Kart World
text:
Nintendo ya reveló oficialmente la fecha de lanzamiento y los precios de su nueva consola, la Nintendo Switch 2, la cuál estará programada para el próximo 5 de junio de este año.
Sobre los precios y las versiones disponibles de la consola, se reveló lo siguiente:
- Versión estándar: $449.99 dólares, que incluye la consola y los nuevos Joy-Con 2.
- Paquete con Mario Kart World: $499.99 dólares, que incluye la consola, los Joy-Con 2 y el juego Mario Kart World en formato digital preinstalado.
En México, aunque aún no se ha anunciado un precio oficial, se estima que la Nintendo Switch 2 podría costar alrededor de $12,000 MXN, dependiendo de impuestos y otros factores.
TE RECOMENDAMOS:
Streaming
Audrey en su Máximo Esplendor: ¿Dónde ver esta serie sobre prejuicios y lealtad?
Características destacadas de la Nintendo Switch 2:
- Pantalla: LCD de 7.9 pulgadas con resolución 1080p y tasa de refresco de 120Hz.
- Almacenamiento: 256 GB de memoria interna ampliable.
- Joy-Con 2: Nuevos controles con botones traseros adicionales y capacidad de funcionar como ratón de computadora, gracias a su sistema de acoplamiento magnético.
- Funciones adicionales: Incorporación de GameChat para comunicación en tiempo real durante el juego y una cámara opcional para videollamadas dentro del ecosistema de la consola.
Disponibilidad y preventa:
La preventa de la Nintendo Switch 2 comenzará el 8 de abril, a través de la My Nintendo Store. Se ofrecerán dos opciones:
- Consola sin juegos: $469.99 euros.
- Consola con Mario Kart World en edición digital: $509.99 euros.
Juegos confirmados para el lanzamiento:
- Mario Kart World: Introduce cambios dinámicos en el clima y el terreno, permitiendo hasta 24 corredores por carrera.
- Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment: Una nueva entrega en la saga de Zelda.
- Además, se han anunciado versiones mejoradas de títulos anteriores y la incorporación de juegos clásicos de GameCube al servicio Nintendo Switch Online.
Para más detalles y actualizaciones, se recomienda visitar el sitio oficial de Nintendo y seguir sus canales en redes sociales.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
Economy, Business and Finance->media and entertainment industry

author: Punch Newspapers
title: APC confident of victory in Osun LG election
text: A chieftain of the All Progressives Congress in Osun State, Dr Thomas Ogungbangbe, has said the party would record a victorious outing in the forthcoming local government polls in the state.

author: @wvlt
title: Sevier County remains on high fire danger alert following wildfires
text:
Sevier County remains on high fire danger alert following wildfires
Firefighters in Sevier County said they are warning everyone to stay alert to the fire danger as winds stay strong and fires from Tuesday night smolder.
SEVIERVILLE, Tenn. (WVLT) - In Sevier County, forestry officials sent drones up to see the damage from the air on Wednesday.
They wanted to see how much the acreage was burning and make sure containment lines were holding from more than a dozen fires that broke out overnight.
Previous Coverage: Two homes damaged, evacuations lifted in Sevier County due to brush fires
Firefighters warn to stay aware of what’s going on as long as the winds are high.
“You know we stood here, and we watched over that direction, and it was just glowing in the sky. But what would happen is, the winds would pick up. You would hear and feel the wind just rushing through here,” said Courtney Lindbert.
Lindbert said Tuesday night brought back memories of 2016 wildfires.
“It’s dark, so you really couldn’t see it, but you can see the glow of the flames, which was terrifying,” she said. “So, we got snacks and waters, and then this tote actually came out of our house in 2016.”
Lindbert packed her car and was ready to leave if she got the evacuation order.
“I got some clothes, and I got, like, all of my children’s clothes that I could grab, and then I told my children to go into their rooms and grab what was their favorite things,” she said.
Firefighters in Sevier County said rains overnight helped knock down the flames that damaged two structures, but they said the fire danger isn’t over yet.
“March is known for wildfires in our county historically. It is not uncommon for us to see that,” said Sevier County Fire Chief David Puckett. “I really want people to take steps to make their home Firewise.”
Some of Lindbert’s family members did get the evacuation orders, but she’s thankful none of them saw any damage.
“All it takes is one ember flying up and or a transformer blowing or something to that extent. So we knew that we didn’t want to put them through driving out of here in something that they didn’t need to see here so we got,” said Lindbert.
Across Sevier County, there were four wildfires Tuesday night totaling more than 200 acres in size and resulted in nearly 100 residents being evacuated from Pittman Center.

author: News Desk
title: Weather system approaching Punjab heavy rainfall forecasted
text:
The Pakistan Meteorological Department has announced that a rain-bearing system will enter the country tomorrow, affecting several regions, including Lahore and much of Punjab.
The system is expected to bring showers, with an increased chance of rain in Lahore and surrounding areas on January 4, Express News reported.
The department also forecasted rain for most districts in Punjab, with Lahore likely to experience rainfall by January 5.
The arrival of this system is expected to increase the intensity of the cold weather, with temperatures dropping further.
Lahore's minimum temperature was recorded at 6°C, while the maximum is expected to reach around 15°C.
The weather pattern will also lead to severe fog in the region, particularly in the mornings and evenings.
This has resulted in challenges for travellers, with several motorways being closed due to poor visibility. The fog will likely continue for the next few days, making travel conditions hazardous.
With this weather change, residents of Lahore and other cities in Punjab are advised to prepare for colder temperatures and potential disruptions to daily activities due to the rain and fog.
Moreover, the first snowfall of the new year in Gilgit-Baltistan and the upper Neelum Valley has [turned](https://tribune.com.pk/story/2519744/chilly-weather-in-gilgit-baltistan-after-snowfall) the weather more chilly in the region.
However, the sky is clear in Murree and Galiyat despite an alert and forecast by PMD and the meteorological department respectively. The first snow fall of the winter season has exacerbated the travel woes of public.
The met office has forecast more snowfall and issued a travel advisory, asking local people and tourists to avoid travelling to the upper areas of G-B.

author: Dr. Alfredo Carpineti
title: We May Have Found A Way To Predict Dangerous Solar Storms Before They Happen
text: Space weather can be beautiful, such as the [incredible aurorae](https://www.iflscience.com/why-were-aurorae-seen-so-far-away-from-the-poles-this-weekend-74189) seen around the world in May, and dangerous, [damaging technology](https://www.iflscience.com/head-on-aurora-causing-solar-storms-are-the-ones-we-really-need-to-worry-about-75065) both temporarily and permanently. Predicting space weather is incredibly important. And researchers now report a better understanding of coronal mass ejections, a crucial development in knowing what kind of danger lies in the future. Coronal mass ejections, or [CMEs](https://www.iflscience.com/tags/coronal-mass-ejections), are powerful expulsions of magnetic field and plasma from the Sun. The plasma is made up of charged particles and when it hits our planet, colliding with Earth's magnetosphere, it can cause geomagnetic storms, sometimes sending satellites and other technology on the fritz. These particles are carried by a magnetic field towards the polar regions, where they hit the atmosphere creating gorgeous auroras. Crucial to predicting the intensity of a solar storm is the speed of CMEs after they have erupted from the Sun. This is something usually measured once the CME has been released. Now scientists have found a way to predict the speed of the event before the eruption. “There are ways to look into the CMEs before they even have erupted from the Sun, and that is by looking into their source region evolutions,” lead researcher [Dr Harshita Gandhi](https://www.aber.ac.uk/en/phys/staff-profiles/listing/profile/hag43/), a solar physicist at Aberystwyth University, told IFLScience. Gandhi and her team looked at these " [active regions](https://www.iflscience.com/sunspot-behind-stunning-auroras-is-back-and-more-solar-storms-could-be-ahead-74425)" on the Sun, where CMEs are born. They measured the properties of the region before, during, and after the release of a CME. They were able to estimate a parameter called "critical height". Above that height, the magnetic field becomes unstable and can lead to the emission of a CME. This height, they found, is linked to the speed. “The higher the critical height you find in the corona in your active region, the faster the CME's speed you would expect from that active region,” Dr Gandhi explained. So by estimating the height, they can predict the likely speed of the CME. And with that, predictions can be made about how dangerous a certain CME might become. The Sun is continuously monitored by space agencies around the world so it shouldn’t be too complicated to implement these kinds of parameter estimations. But that's not the end of it. To improve these predictions, the team plans to add another parameter.: the strength of the magnetic field will help strengthen the estimate of the speed. This research expands what we know of the Sun as well as improves our [space weather forecasting capabilities](https://www.iflscience.com/iflscience-the-big-questions-are-we-ready-for-the-next-massive-solar-flare-71045), which in a technological world is vital should we ever see a [Carrington Event-level](https://www.iflscience.com/historys-biggest-solar-storm-the-carrington-event-was-even-bigger-than-we-realized-73527) event again. Dr Gandhi presented the team’s findings today at the Royal Astronomical Society’s [National Astronomy Meeting](https://nam2024.hull.ac.uk/) in Hull, UK.

author: @wymt
title: Kentucky MBB season ticket prices increase
text: Kentucky MBB season ticket prices increase LEXINGTON, Ky. – Most seating sections for Kentucky Men’s Basketball season ticket holders will see price increases for the first time since the 2019-2020 season. The areas where prices will go up are in the lower bowl, chairback areas of the upper bowl, and select bleachers areas in the upper bowl. Prices for most upper-level bleacher seats will remain unchanged. Nearly 80% of all season tickets will see either a 5% increase or no increase at all. The most significant adjustments are in the premium seating areas near the court, including the sideline risers, and in the first four permanent rows along both lower-level sidelines. - 13% of season ticket holders will experience no increase - 64% of season ticket holders will experience an approximate 5% increase - 16% of season ticket holders will experience an approximate 12% increase - 7% of season ticket holders will experience an approximate 25% or higher increase Season ticket renewals for the 2024-25 Kentucky men’s basketball season are now available to all season ticket holders. Early renewal incentives will be available through Aug. 8. The renewal deadline is Thursday, Aug. 29. Copyright 2024 WYMT. All rights reserved.
